mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pickupman (PM_NAME, PM_TEL, PM_REGION, PM_PROFILE) VALUES (#{pmName}, #{pmTel}, #{pmRegion}, #{pmProfile})
mapper.select: select pm.pm_no as pmNo, pm.pm_name as pmName, pm.pm_tel as pmTel, pm.pm_status as pmStatus, pm.pm_region as pmRegion, pm.pm_profile as pmProfile from pickupman pm WHERE pm.PM_REGION = ( SELECT SUBSTRING(col.col_addr, 1, 2) FROM collection col LEFT JOIN pickupman pm ON pm.PM_NO = col.COL_PM_NO WHERE col.col_num = #{colNum} )
